name: 陳秀慧
objective:
教授基本的重量、滴定、電位、光譜和分子分光分析並就如何取樣，分離以及所得的數據做一分析，另就分析上所用之藥品，裝置及單元操作予以說明。
The content of this course includes gravimetric, titrimetric potentiometric, spectroscopic methods of analysis.  Topics in statistics and data analysis, preparation and analysis of real samples, and equipment and practice of chemical analysis are also discussed.
schedule:
W1. The Nature of Analytical Chemistry (分析化學之本質)
W2.  Chemicals, Apparatus, and Unit Operations of Analytical Chemistry (分析化學之試藥、儀器與單元操作)
W3. Using Spreadsheets in Analytical Chemistry (將試算表應用於分析化學)
W4.. Calculations Used in Analytical Chemistry (分析化學使用之計算方法)
W5. Errors in Chemical Analyses (化學分析中的誤差)
W6.. Random Errors in Chemical Analysis (化學分析中的隨機誤差)
W7. Statistical Data Treatment and Evaluation (統計數據之評估)
W8. Sampling, Standardization, and Calibration (取樣、標定與校正)
W9. Aqueous Solutions and Chemical Equilibria (水溶液與化學平衡)
W10. Effect of Electrolytes on Chemical Equilibria (電解質對化學平衡之影響)
W11. Solving Equilibrium Problems for Complex Systems (複雜問題之求解)
W12. Gravimetric Methods of Analysis (重量分析法)
W13. Titrations in Analytical Chemistry (滴定法)
W14. Principles of Neutralization Titrations (中和滴定之原理)
W15. Complex Acid/Bases Systems (酸鹼系統)
W16. Applications of Neutralization Titrations (酸鹼滴定之應用)
W17. Complexation and Precipitation Reactions and Titrations (錯合物與沉澱反應和滴定)
W18. Final Exam
materials: Fundamentals of Analytical Chemistry, by Skoog, West, Holler and Crouch, 9th edition
